title: 100: God is Grey & The Bible Broads
itunes:title: 100: God is Grey & The Bible Broads
description:
The Broads are joined by Brenda Marie Davies aka the face and voice of YouTube Channel/Podcast “God is Grey” - a channel championing sex positive, science based, LGBTQIA affirming Christianity. They chat about her journey, purity culture, “cherry picking”, homosexuality and the Bible, Jesus and politics, and much more! 
GOD IS GREY:
Follow Brenda on instagram: @godisgrey
Subscribe/check out her Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Xf6ScN9riYhTOUsvhkhaw/featured
Listen to her podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/god-is-grey/id1437717099
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** CASETIFY: Go to http://casetify.com/chatty today to get 20% off your new favorite phone case!
*** DHM DETOX: Go to DHMdetox.com (http://dhmdetox.com/) and use promo code "CHATTY30” at checkout to get 30% off your order!
*** BOMBAS: Go to http://bombas.com/chatty and get 20% off any purchase during their big holiday sale, November 18th through December 5th!
*** FAB FIT FUN: use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at ​www.fabfitfun.com (http://www.fabfitfun.com/) ​ #fabfitfunpartner

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
